name: Puzzle Adventure ∙
description:
Explore the world and train your brain! Relax and try to reach the most exotic countries in the world. 200+ countries available from the easiest to the hardest tangram.


- Fill the shapes with colorful blocks
- Unique and beautiful design
- Train your brain with challenging levels
You will NOT put your phone down with this whole new exciting puzzle game!
